Note: For a similar rubric in prose see London, Lambeth Palace Library 559, f. 140.
_description: A rubric advocating the use of Psalm LXIX — twenty-five couplets

BLHar2869.First Lines: HE þat deuoutely this orisowneEche day sey wyth good deuocyowne…
BLHar2869.Last Lines: …No man knowiþ þis orisoun wiþoutiþ misseSaue god only what virtu þer in is
BLHar2869.Note: Entirely written in rubric, written as prose.
